item.title: Fire Extinguisher SQUIB TEST System – APU Squib Test Functions

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided APU is considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional deferral required – Auxiliary Power Unit (APU).
An auto-generated ACARS message requesting an inflight APU start should be disregarded.

placard.para: Placard Squib Test Switch P61 Panel "APU SQUIB TEST INOP" as appropriate and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
